context_bundle.summary: WSL cannot write to Windows protected AppData directories

onboarding.quick_start: Use native PowerShell for Windows config operations, not WSL bash
symptoms: File created but app can't read it
Works in PowerShell, fails in WSL

root_cause.wsl_permissions: WSL runs as different user context than Windows
root_cause.appdata_protected: AppData folders have special Windows permissions
root_cause.cross_filesystem: NTFS permissions don't map cleanly to Linux

solution.use_powershell: Run config operations in native PowerShell
solution.avoid_wsl_for_config: WSL fine for reading, not writing Windows config
solution.alternative: Use PowerShell remoting or direct execution

detection.check: If script needs to write to AppData, must be native Windows
